sentences.english: Soft can processing technique of water bamboo with pickled potherb mustard was optimized.
sentences.chinese: 對雪菜茭白軟罐頭的加工工藝進行了探討和優化。

sentences.english: Wild rice stem belongs to herb of marsh of gramineous vivacious perennial root.
sentences.chinese: 茭白屬於禾本科多年生宿根沼澤草本植物。

sentences.english: The breeding techniques and their future research aspects of water bamboo were also discussed.
sentences.chinese: 討論了茭白育種技術及需要研究的問題。

definition: winter bamboo shoots (smaller and tenderer as a result of being dug out before they come out of the soil)
Chinese water chestnut/Eleocharis dulcis or E. congesta
